verses.verse: Now <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%> was a <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1368>warrior,<s%> but he was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H802>harlot.<s%> <S%H2181><s%> And <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> was the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3316>Jephthah.<s%>

And Gilead's <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and when his wife's <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1431>grew<s%> up, they <S%H1644>drove<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> out and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "You shall not <S%H5157>have<s%> an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> in our father's <S%H1004>house,<s%> for you are the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H802>woman.<s%>"

So <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> from his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2897>Tob;<s%> and <S%H7386>worthless<s%> <S%H376>fellows<s%> <S%H3950>gathered<s%> themselves <S%H413>about<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> and they <S%H3318>went<s%> out with him.
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H4480>after<s%> a <S%H3117>while<s%> that the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>happened<s%> <S%H9201>when<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H3947>get<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2897>Tob;<s%>
and they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> <S%H1980>"Come<s%> and be our <S%H7101>chief<s%> that we may <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>"

Then <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> "Did you not <S%H8130>hate<s%> me and <S%H1644>drive<s%> me from my father's <S%H1004>house<s%>? So <S%H4069>why<s%> have you <S%H935>come<s%> to me <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H9201>when<s%> you are in <S%H9503>trouble<s%>?"

And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> "For <S%H3651>this<s%> <S%H3651>reason<s%> we have <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to you, that you may <S%H1980>go<s%> with us and <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> and <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>"

So <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> you <S%H7725>take<s%> me <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> them up to me, will I <S%H1961>become<s%> your <S%H7218>head<s%>?"

And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H8085>witness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us; <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> we will <S%H6213>do<s%> as you have <S%H1697>said.<s%>"

Then <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> him <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H7101>chief<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them; and <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at <S%H4709>Mizpah.<s%>

Now <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> is between you and me, that you have <S%H935>come<s%> to me to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against my <S%H776>land<s%>?"

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> away my <S%H776>land<s%> when they <S%H5927>came<s%> up from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H2999>Jabbok<s%> and the <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> therefore, <S%H7725>return<s%> them <S%H7965>peaceably<s%> <S%H6258>now.<s%>"
But <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H3254><s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%>

and they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> <S%H3478>'Israel<s%> did not <S%H3947>take<s%> away the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>

'For when they <S%H5927>came<s%> up from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> through the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6946>Kadesh,<s%>

then <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> let us <S%H5674>pass<s%> through your <S%H776>land,<s%>" but the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom<s%> would not <S%H8085>listen.<s%> And they <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> but he would not <S%H14>consent.<s%> So <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> at <S%H6946>Kadesh.<s%>

'Then they <S%H1980>went<s%> through the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H8121><s%> <S%H4217>side<s%> <S%H8121><s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and they <S%H2583>camped<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H769>Arnon;<s%> but they did not <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> for the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> [was] the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

'And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4994>"Please<s%> let us <S%H5674>pass<s%> through your <S%H776>land<s%> to our <S%H4725>place.<s%>"

'But <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> did not <S%H539>trust<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through his <S%H1366>territory;<s%> so <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in <S%H3096>Jahaz,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

'And the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they <S%H5221>defeated<s%> them; so <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of that <S%H776>country.<s%>

'So they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> from the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> and from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

'Since <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3423>drove<s%> out the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> His <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> are you then to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it?

'Do you not <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> your <S%H430>god<s%> <S%H3423>gives<s%> you to <S%H3423>possess<s%>? So <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H3423>driven<s%> out <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> us, we will <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

'And <S%H6258>now<s%> are you <S%H2895>any<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>? Did he <S%H7378>ever<s%> <S%H7378>strive<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> did he <S%H3898>ever<s%> <S%H3898>fight<s%> against them?

'While <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> and its <S%H1323>villages,<s%> and in <S%H6177>Aroer<s%> and its <S%H1323>villages,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are on the <S%H3027>banks<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> did you not <S%H5337>recover<s%> them within that <S%H6256>time<s%>?

'I therefore have not <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against you, but you are <S%H6213>doing<s%> me <S%H9567>wrong<s%> by <S%H3898>making<s%> <S%H3898>war<s%> against me; may the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H8199>Judge,<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>' "
But the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H3808>disregarded<s%> <S%H8085><s%> the <S%H1697>message<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> him.

Now the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> upon <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> so that he <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%> then he <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H4708>Mizpah<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and from <S%H4708>Mizpah<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> he <S%H5674>went<s%> on to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H5087>made<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> Thou wilt <S%H5414>indeed<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand,<s%>

then it shall be that <S%H834>whatever<s%> <S%H3318>comes<s%> out of the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> me when I <S%H7725>return<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> it shall be the Lord's, and I will <S%H5927>offer<s%> it up as a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%> "

So <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H5674>crossed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against them; and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And he <S%H5221>struck<s%> them with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%> from <S%H6177>Aroer<s%> to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H4511>Minnith,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and as <S%H5704>far<s%> as Abel-keramim. So the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> were <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

When <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> at <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> was <S%H3318>coming<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him with <S%H8596>tambourines<s%> and with <S%H4246>dancing.<s%> Now she was his <S%H3173>one<s%> [and] <S%H7534>only<s%> <S%H3173>child;<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> her he <S%H369>had<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H176>nor<s%> <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> her, that he <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>"Alas,<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter!<s%> You have <S%H3766>brought<s%> me <S%H3766>very<s%> <S%H3766>low,<s%> and you are among those who <S%H5916>trouble<s%> me; for I have <S%H6475>given<s%> my <S%H6310>word<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H7725>take<s%> [it] <S%H7725>back.<s%>"

So she <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "My father, you have <S%H1>given<s%> your <S%H6475>word<s%> to the <S%H6310>Lord;<s%> <S%H3068>do<s%> to me as you have <S%H6213>said<s%><S%H3318>,<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6310>since<s%> <S%H310><s%> the <S%H834>Lord<s%> has <S%H3068>avenged<s%> you of your <S%H5360>enemies,<s%> the <S%H340>sons<s%> of <S%H1121>Ammon.<s%>"

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to her father, "Let <S%H1>this<s%> <S%H2088>thing<s%> be <S%H1697>done<s%> for me; <S%H6213>let<s%> me <S%H7503>alone<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7503>two<s%> <S%H8147>months,<s%> that I may <S%H2320>go<s%> <S%H1980><s%> to the <S%H3381>mountains<s%> and <S%H2022>weep<s%> <S%H1058>because<s%> of my <S%H5921>virginity,<s%> I and my <S%H1331>companions.<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go.<s%>" So he <S%H7971>sent<s%> her <S%H7971>away<s%> for <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2320>months;<s%> and she <S%H1980>left<s%> with her <S%H7464>companions,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of her <S%H1331>virginity.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> that she <S%H7725>returned<s%> to her father, who <S%H1>did<s%> to her according to the <S%H6213>vow<s%> <S%H5088>which<s%> he had <S%H834>made;<s%> and she <S%H5087>had<s%> <S%H3045>no<s%> <S%H3808>relations<s%> with a <S%H3045>man.<s%> Thus it <S%H376>became<s%> a <S%H1961>custom<s%> in <S%H2706>Israel,<s%>

that the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H3117>yearly<s%> to <S%H8567>commemorate<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H8141>year.<s%>
